title: GIPHY
description: Data Science and Analytics are an important part of what makes GIPHY the best place to find GIFs. We recently teamed up with Interana to help them spread the message of good data analytics practices during their “Summer Data Love Roadshow”. I answered questions from New York area Data Scientists, Product Managers, CEOs, etc along […]

title: Is CockroachDB Good for Hackathons?
description:
Hackathons are––for the uninitiated––a little insane, and HTN one of the craziest among them. 1,000 students from all across the globe (literally!) descend on Waterloo, Ontario for a 36-contiguous-hour event to build a team and create interesting software.
While students might be motivated by prizes awarded in cash, pride, swag, and lucrative employment opportunities––it feels like most of all, students are eager to learn about new technologies and show what they can do in a day and a half.

title: SF ReactJS Meetup: hosted at Mixmax
description:
I recently had the pleasure of presenting at the SF ReactJS meetup which was hosted here at Mixmax. I presented on a blog post that I previously wrote on moving from Backbone to React.
